com.pb.locationintelligence.segmentation

Interface SegmentationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SegmentationServiceImpl

    public interface SegmentationService
    This Service provides lifestyle segmentation data for a specific area.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getSegmentationByAddress(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String country, RequestObserver<Segmentation> requestObserver)
      Returns the lifestyle segmentation data for the specified address asynchronously
      void getSegmentationByLocation(android.content.Context context, java.lang.Double longitude, java.lang.Double latitude, RequestObserver<Segmentation> requestObserver)
      Returns the lifestyle segmentation data for the specified location asynchronously

        address - Required - address text
        country - Optional - Country Code Acceptable list of country codes: USA,CAN,AUS,SWE,JPN,GBR
